activities: Boston Research Group conducts market research activities on behalf of our clients.  These activities might include site visits, focus groups, personal interviews, telephone interviews, or surveys conducted by phone or over the Internet.  All information collected as a result of these activities are proprietary to our client and are not made available to any other party.  Personal contact information is not associated with any information provided by our subjects without their explicit consent nor is the identity of our subjects made available without their explicit consent.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
